Forms¶

class djgentelella.forms.forms.CustomForm(data=None, files=None, auto_id='id_%s', prefix=None, initial=None, error_class=<class 'django.forms.utils.ErrorList'>, label_suffix=None, empty_permitted=False, field_order=None, use_required_attribute=None, renderer=None)¶

Append the next render methods to forms

as_horizontal()¶

Return this form rendered as HTML <tr>s – excluding the <table></table>.

as_inline()¶

Return this form rendered as HTML <tr>s – excluding the <table></table>.

as_plain()¶

Returns this form rendered as HTML <tr>s – excluding the <table></table>.
